 All functionality of the content is operable through a keyboard interface
without requiring specific timings for individual keystrokes. â€Œ â€Œ â€Œ â€Œ â€Œ â€Œ â€Œ â€Œ â€Œ
â€Œ â€Œ â€Œ â€Œ â€Œ â€Œ â€Œ â€Œ â€Œ KEYBOARD ACCESSIBLE
KEYBOARD (NO EXCEPTION)(LEVEL AAA)
On accessible websites...

All functionality of the content is operable through a keyboard interface
without requiring specific timings for individual keystrokes. 

These websites...

Make all functionality available from a keyboard.

WHAT'S AN EXAMPLE?
My bot couldn't find any ðŸ˜¢. But the linked pages might still have ones it
missed.

[https://www.w3.org/WAI/WCAG21/Understanding/keyboard-no-exception.html#examples]
 Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 2.2, W3C World Wide Web Consortium
Recommendation 27 February 2020 (https://www.w3.org/TR/2020/WD-WCAG22-20200227/,
Latest version at https://www.w3.org/TR/WCAG22/)
